name: Heatwave (Amy's Games)
description:
Collect all the items and find your way to the Exit lift, you may need to find the Exit Lift Key to finish the level!

This level is part of a collaboration project based on climate change, it is the fourth level in the series.

Please take your time to read the descriptions of the items that you've picked up!


UNDER CONSTRUCTION:
The UI only currently works with the mouse but the rest of the game works with the controller if you wish to play that way.
(Current Issues: No death from AI patrol, No death from temperature reaching 10, Greenhouse unreachable, Crouch animation no complete, no model for AI, game restarts if you quit rather than continues where you left off. )

Menu Controls:
Mouse to navigate
Click to interact

Game Controls:
Keyboard:
E = Pickup
W,A,S,D = Movement
A = Jump
C = Crouch
P = Pause
U = Document Menu
I = Inventory Menu

Controller:
X = Pickup
Left Stick = Movement
Left Bumper = Inventory
Right Bumper = Documents
B = Crouch
Start = Pause
